AI Description: torchsampler is a library for data sampling in PyTorch, designed to efficiently handle various sampling strategies and techniques to improve data processing and training of deep learning models.
Core Features:
1. Implementation of various data sampling strategies
2. Seamless integration with PyTorch for easy implementation
3. Efficient handling of large datasets
4. Customizable sampling techniques for diverse use cases
Research Field: Computer & Information Sciences, Artificial Intelligence & Intelligent Systems
